@shurcooL thanks for doing this. 
The filepath.Walk's behavior is annoying  - the first path is fed without any slash replacement.
What about filepath.Rel("C:\\Go\\src", "C:/Go/src/path/filepath")?

If we decide to stay with the current (unintended) behavior, I hope to convert those as a test too to ensure no regression, and to ensure documentation when a new function is introduced.
